channel.title: Comments on: Taste of Sydney – March 2010

item.title: By: Lorraine @NotQuiteNigella
item.dc:creator: Lorraine @NotQuiteNigella
item.description: Wasn't it fun!? :D We really enjoyed ourselves and we also loved the Wagyu daube (but I also loved the crab sandwiches too) :P
item.content:encoded: Wasn’t it fun!? ðŸ˜€ We really enjoyed ourselves and we also loved the Wagyu daube (but I also loved the crab sandwiches too) ðŸ˜›

item.title: By: Anita@noredmeat
item.dc:creator: Anita@noredmeat
item.description:
Great review! I went on Friday night too. Shame I didn't know you were going. Would have loved to meet you. I also highlighted the menu before I went. I tried totally different things to you. I was planning on going to the Taste kitchen first but I made a sporadic decision to go to the wine tasting session on wines to complement spicy food and it was great.
Loved the wobbly boob from Jonah's too!
item.content:encoded:
Great review! I went on Friday night too. Shame I didn’t know you were going. Would have loved to meet you. I also highlighted the menu before I went. I tried totally different things to you. I was planning on going to the Taste kitchen first but I made a sporadic decision to go to the wine tasting session on wines to complement spicy food and it was great.

Loved the wobbly boob from Jonah’s too!

item.title: By: Juliana
item.dc:creator: Juliana
item.description: Wow, everything looks so yummie...so much fun!
item.content:encoded: Wow, everything looks so yummie…so much fun!

item.title: By: Jeanne
item.dc:creator: Jeanne
item.description: Beautiful review! The artisan bread looks superb. And I'd love to try those wagyu burgers! I wouldn't even know where to begin with all those desserts - good thing you brought friends to help taste test!
item.content:encoded: Beautiful review! The artisan bread looks superb. And I’d love to try those wagyu burgers! I wouldn’t even know where to begin with all those desserts – good thing you brought friends to help taste test!

item.title: By: Lorraine @NotQuiteNigella
item.dc:creator: Lorraine @NotQuiteNigella
item.description: Wasn't that beef daube amazing? I need to go to Guillame now after trying that and the crab sandwich! :D
item.content:encoded: Wasn’t that beef daube amazing? I need to go to Guillame now after trying that and the crab sandwich! ðŸ˜€

item.title: By: Barbara
item.dc:creator: Barbara
item.description: I love this kind of post, Anita! It truly does introduce us to the taste of Sydney. And it's pretty smart of the chefs to take part too...it's a surefire way to get entice people to your restaurant. Of course, as always, the desserts would have all my attention! The vanilla panna cotta looks divine!
item.content:encoded:
I love this kind of post, Anita! It truly does introduce us to the taste of Sydney. And it’s pretty smart of the chefs to take part too…it’s a surefire way to get entice people to your restaurant.
Of course, as always, the desserts would have all my attention! The vanilla panna cotta looks divine!

item.title: By: Trissa
item.dc:creator: Trissa
item.description: I missed Taste of Sydney! I so regret - it looks like everyone had lots of fun and great food!
item.content:encoded: I missed Taste of Sydney! I so regret – it looks like everyone had lots of fun and great food!

item.title: By: Julia @ MÃ©langer
item.dc:creator: Julia @ MÃ©langer
item.description: Wow, what a line up of food. Glad you had some friends/helpers for tasting.
item.content:encoded: Wow, what a line up of food. Glad you had some friends/helpers for tasting.

item.title: By: Mother-in-law
item.dc:creator: Mother-in-law
item.description: A masterful and very informative review. Made it seem like I was there with you. A good suggestion to the organisers about offering more free tastings. It is the best way to get an unbiased opinion of a product.
item.content:encoded: A masterful and very informative review. Made it seem like I was there with you. A good suggestion to the organisers about offering more free tastings. It is the best way to get an unbiased opinion of a product.

item.title: By: Conor @ HoldtheBeef
item.dc:creator: Conor @ HoldtheBeef
item.description:
Great review of the show. Looks like you did some good eating! I'd really like some of the tuna, and the lamb with peas please :)
Those little burgers are almost as cute as the cygnet!
item.content:encoded:
Great review of the show. Looks like you did some good eating! I’d really like some of the tuna, and the lamb with peas please ðŸ™‚

Those little burgers are almost as cute as the cygnet!
